des: "Wake up in the morning and breakfast is served, the house smells like heaven. This is my new comfort food. Play with different types of seasonal fruits (peaches, apples, raisins, cranberries, etc.). Sprinkle chopped nuts or granola on the top to give it a little crunch."
ins:
Stir soy milk, water, quinoa, blueberries, chia seeds, and honey together in a slow cooker.
Cook on Low 6 to 8 hours.
